original_text: Every year, Samuel's mother made a little coat for him. She took it to him when she went to Shiloh. She and her husband went there every year to offer their sacrifice to God. Every year, Samuel's mother made a little coat for him. She took it to him when she went to Shiloh. She and her husband went there every year to offer their sacrifice to God.
korean_text: 그의 어머니가 매년 드리는 제사를 드리러 그의 남편과 함께 올라갈 때마다 작은 겉옷을 지어다가 그에게 주었더니

sentences.original_text: Samuel's mother made a little coat for him.
sentences.korean_translation: 사무엘의 어머니는 그를 위해 작은 겉옷을 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: She and her husband went there every year
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀와 그녀의 남편은 매년 그곳에 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: to offer their sacrifice to God.

sentences.korean_translation: 그녀와 그녀의 남편은 매년 그곳에 갔습니다.
